sentences.en: Generally, the types of shade can be divided into deep shade, part shade, and dappled shade.
sentences.cn: 一般来说, 树荫的种类可以分为深度树荫, 局部树荫和斑点树荫.

sentences.en: Some nights I gathered many blood - dappled coins, but garnered neither lives nor knowledge.
sentences.cn: 许多夜晚我能得到很多血迹斑斑的银币, 却得不到任何生命和知识.

sentences.en: Sometimes I carry a book out under the pear trees and sit in the dappled shade.
sentences.cn: 有时我会拿一本书去梨树底下，坐在斑驳的树影中看。

sentences.en: Stained - glass window panels rendered startling sun - dappled interior effects.
sentences.cn: 彩绘玻璃窗条造成令人惊讶的室内光斑效果.

sentences.en: the cool dappled light under the trees
The dappled horse now began to go ahead.
the dappled shade of the trees
The path was dappled with sunlight.
sentences.cn: 小径上洒下斑斑点点的阳光。

sentences.en: The sun shining through the leaves dappled the ground.
sentences.cn: 阳光穿过树叶照射在地上,现出一块块亮斑.

sentences.en: The sun shinning through the leaves dappled the ground.
sentences.cn: 阳光穿过树叶照在地上,现出一块块亮斑.

sentences.en: They all sit on the dirt in the dappled shade of a tree.
sentences.cn: 他们全都坐在斑驳树阴下的泥土地上。

sentences.en: Wall eyes, except in the case of dappled dogs, are a serious fault.
sentences.cn: 除了斑点色的腊肠犬, 眼睛出现色环属于非常严重的缺陷.

sentences.en: With dappled shadow of trees and lingering sound of cicada.
sentences.cn: 斑驳的树影、悠长的蝉音.

trans.tran_en: marked with spots of colour, light, or shade

trans.tran_cn: 起斑纹（dapple的过去式和过去分词）
